attributes.action: Make it law to require all drivers of three-wheeled cars to hold a full car licence instead of the current requirement for only a motorcycle licence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Three-wheeled cars such as Reliants only require a motorcycle licence to drive them. However, they are the same size as many small cars and take up the same amount of road space. It is unfair that people should be allowed to drive these vehicles while holding only a motorcycle licence.
